column2: film=''[[The Lord of the Rings: Conquest]]''

column1: An actor with a long acting career, his first roles included Jon Forsyte in the critically acclaimed [[wikipedia:The_Forsyte_Saga#1967_mini-series
column2: miniseries ''The Forsyte Saga'']], and the title character in Dickens' ''[[wikipedia:Nicholas Nickleby
column3: Nicholas Nickleby]]''. Many roles followed on stage, on screen and on the radio. He also served as storyteller on ''[[Jackanory]]'' for six episodes.
